mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( USER_SEQ_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, GENDER, REG_DATE, CHG_DATE )VALUES ( USER_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{gender}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
